name: Packing Up (Stephen Borden)
description:
It’s time to pack up your childhood bedroom. To move out and move on. Pick up items and take a moment to reflect on the memories you shared. Then place them in the box.

We started this project at the 2019 Global Game Jam where the theme was "what home means to you."

Credits
Stephen Borden - Programmer
Ilya Polyakov - Programmer
Alex Turbyfield - Artist
Ali Yildirim - Sound Designer
Mark Zamlinsky - Artist
